TLINE.TDLINE: The objective of this interface is to cover the requirements of the
For this process, a set of interfaces is defined to relate SAP to the
subcontractor system. The interfaces will automate most of the steps of
The objective is to develop a global set of interfaces that will be used
for any new or existing subcontractor that wish to be interfaced with
For more information related to the process description, please refer to
The RICEF 33 Bill of Material (BOM) interface will cover the requirement
of sending the Diageo Bill of Material information to the subcontractor.
The subcontractor is then required to automatically or manually upload
the information received into its system.
The interface will send on a daily basis the Bill of Materials that have
been created or modified since the last execution of the interface.
·,,Sterling will be used as the intermediate platform from where 3PM
Interfaces files will be received, formatted and sent to the Third Party
·,,The IDoc file will be converted at Sterling into one flat-file, which
will contain the Header information and the information for all items.
·,,The information will be sent from Sterling to the Third Party as a
flat-file. The flat-file format is indicated in the mapping document.
·,,<ZH>Plant:</> Plant selection field will be used to select the Third
Party Plant we want to interface with the Subcontractor. This field is
required and multiple values are accepted, in order to be able to send
with just one execution of the program the information for multiple
·,,<ZH>Creation / Modification Date:</> The date range selection field
is used to select the BOM that have been created or modified during the
This field is optional. If no date is selected, the program should
select all creation or modifications done since the last time the
·,,<ZH>BOM status: </>The BOM status selection screen is used to select
the BOM in table STKO according to the status.
This selection is optional. If no value is entered, the program should
·,,<ZH>Bills of Materials to send:</> This selection field is used to
define what Bill of Materials should be sent. The field will have two
options, just one can be selected.
,,o,,If #<ZH>All Bills of Material</># option is selected, the
information of all Bill of Material existing in the Plants ,,,,and with
the Status according to the selection screen will be sent. Therefore the
selection field ,,,,,,#Creation / Modification Date# is not used.
,,o,,If #<ZH>Bills of Material created / modified in Date range</>#
option is selected, the information of just the ,,,,BOM created/modified
in the Date range selected, existing in the Plants and with the Status
,,,,,,according to the selection screen, will be sent.
